body_html:
In the training loop that make sense,
but after the training I do inference on the test dataset.
I aggregate all the predicted labels to compute some metrics.

Right now I do detach after each prediction.

Is there clever way to do that?
body_text:
In the training loop that make sense,
but after the training I do inference on the test dataset.
I aggregate all the predicted labels to compute some metrics.
Right now I do detach after each prediction.
Is there clever way to do that?
body:
In the training loop that make sense,
but after the training I do inference on the test dataset.
I aggregate all the predicted labels to compute some metrics.

Right now I do **detach after each prediction**.

Is there clever way to do that?
